
;======Flex Turning Lanes======
;Added by memo 2014/01/06

;>>>> 1-tile Turning Lanes
;
;default TL override
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
;default ML override
0x5B200F00,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B200F00,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200F00,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B200F00,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200F00,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B200F00,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200F00,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B200F00,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
;
;>> TRANSITIONS
;
;RD2-to-TL transition
0x5B204000,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204000,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204000,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204000,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204000,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204000,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204000,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204000,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
;
;RD2-to-ML transition
0x5B204400,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204400,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204400,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204400,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204400,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204400,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204400,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204400,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
;
;TL-to-TL transition (single tile)
0x5B204800,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204800,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204800,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204800,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204800,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204800,3,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204800,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204800,1,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
;
;TL-to-TL transition (double tile)
0x5B204000,3,0,0x5B204000,1,0=0x5B204900,3,0,0x5B204900,1,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B204000,3,0,0x5B204900,1,0=0x5B204900,3,0,0x5B204900,1,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B204900,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204900,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204900,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204900,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204900,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204900,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204900,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204900,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
;
;ARD3 NWM starter TL
0x5B204300,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204300,3,0,0x51020000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204300,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204300,1,1,0x51020000,1,0 ;LHD
0x5B204300,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204300,3,0,0x51020000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204300,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204300,1,1,0x51020000,1,0 ;LHD
;ARD3-to-TL transition
0x5B204300,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204300,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204300,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204300,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204300,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204300,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204300,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204300,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
;ARD3 NWM starter ML
0x5B204700,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204700,3,0,0x51020000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204700,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204700,1,1,0x51020000,1,0 ;LHD
0x5B204700,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204700,3,0,0x51020000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204700,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204700,1,1,0x51020000,1,0 ;LHD
;ARD3-to-ML transition
0x5B204700,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204700,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204700,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204700,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204700,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204700,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204700,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204700,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
;
;TLA3 NWM starter TL
0x5B204100,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204100,3,0,0x51000000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204100,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204100,1,1,0x51000000,1,0 ;LHD
0x5B204100,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204100,3,0,0x51000000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204100,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204100,1,1,0x51000000,3,0 ;LHD
;TLA3-to-TL transition
0x5B204100,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204100,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204100,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204100,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204100,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204100,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204100,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204100,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
;TLA3 NWM starter ML
0x5B204500,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204500,3,0,0x51000000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204500,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204500,1,1,0x51000000,1,0 ;LHD
0x5B204500,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204500,3,0,0x51000000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204500,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204500,1,1,0x51000000,3,0 ;LHD
;TLA3-to-ML transition
0x5B204500,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204500,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204500,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204500,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204500,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204500,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204500,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204500,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
;
;AVE2 NWM starter TL
0x5B204200,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204200,3,0,0x51010000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204200,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204200,1,1,0x51010000,1,0 ;LHD
0x5B204200,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204200,3,0,0x51010000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204200,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204200,1,1,0x51010000,3,0 ;LHD
;AVE2-to-TL transition
0x5B204200,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204200,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204200,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204200,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204200,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204200,1,0,0x5B200000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204200,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204200,3,1,0x5B200000,3,1 ;LHD
;AVE2 NWM starter ML
0x5B204600,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204600,3,0,0x51010000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204600,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204600,1,1,0x51010000,1,0 ;LHD
0x5B204600,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204600,3,0,0x51010000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B204600,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204600,1,1,0x51010000,3,0 ;LHD
;AVE2-to-ML transition
0x5B204600,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204600,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204600,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B204600,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B204600,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204600,1,0,0x5B200F00,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B204600,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B204600,3,1,0x5B200F00,3,1 ;LHD
;
;>> INTERSECTIONS
;
;Street (4-way)
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00AA0A00,0,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207000,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00AA0A00,0,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00AA0A00,2,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00AA0A00,2,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207000,1,1 ;LHD
;Street (3-way)
0x5B200F00,1,0,0x00AA0800,0,0=0x5B200F00,1,0,0x5B207100,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200F00,3,1,0x00AA0800,2,0=0x5B200F00,3,1,0x5B207100,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00AA0800,2,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207100,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00AA0800,0,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207100,1,1 ;LHD
;
;Road (4-way)
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00020700,0,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207300,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00020700,0,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207300,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00020700,1,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207300,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00020700,1,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207300,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00020700,2,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207300,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00020700,2,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207300,1,1 ;LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00020700,3,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207300,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00020700,3,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207300,1,1 ;LHD
;Road (3-way)
0x5B200F00,1,0,0x00005700,1,0=0x5B200F00,1,0,0x5B207400,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200F00,3,1,0x00005700,3,0=0x5B200F00,3,1,0x5B207400,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x00005700,3,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207400,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B200000,3,1,0x00005700,1,0=0x5B200000,3,1,0x5B207400,1,1 ;LHD
;
;TL (4-way)
0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207300,0,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B208000,0,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207300,2,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B208000,2,0 ;RHD&LHD
;TL (3-way)
0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B207400,2,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B208100,2,0 ;RHD&LHD
;
;Road-TL x Ave-TL
0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B227200,0,0=0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B228000,0,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B228000,0,0,0x5B227200,2,0=0x5B228000,0,0,0x5B228000,2,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B228080,0,0,0x5B228000,2,0=0x5B228000,0,0,0x5B228000,2,0 ;RHD&LHD
;Road-TL (T-End) x Ave-TL
0x5B228000,0,0,0x5B227300,0,0=0x5B228080,0,0,0x5B228100,0,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B228080,0,0,0x5B227300,0,0=0x5B228080,0,0,0x5B228100,0,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B228000,0,0,0x5B228100,0,0=0x5B228080,0,0,0x5B228100,0,0 ;RHD&LHD

;==== Alex's code ====

;Experiment at RD FTL T-INT for L|R Setup
0x5B200000,1,0,0x5B208100,2,0=0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B208100,2,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B207400,2,0=0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B208100,2,0 ;RHD&LHD


;Experiment at AVE T-Int for L|R setup
0x5B228080,2,0,0x5B200000,3,0=0x5B228080,2,0,0x5B200100,3,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B200100,3,0,0x5B200000,3,0=0x5B200100,3,0,0x5B200100,3,0 ;RHD&LHD
;Stability
0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B227200,0,0=0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B228080,0,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B228000,0,0=0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B228080,0,0 ;RHD&LHD
0x5B200100,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B200100,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200100,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B200100,1,0,0x5B200100,1,0 ;RHD
0x5B200100,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5B200100,3,1,0x5B200100,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B200100,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5B200100,3,1,0x5B200100,3,1 ;LHD

;TYPE 120 (Avenue/TLA-5)
0x5B224000,0,0,0x04006100,2,0=0x5B224000,0,0,0x5B224080,0,0 ;RHD
0x5B224080,0,1,0x04006100,2,0=0x5B224080,0,1,0x5B224000,0,1 ;LHD
0x04006100,0,0,0x5B224080,0,0=0x5B224000,0,0,0x5B224080,0,0 ;RHD
0x04006100,0,0,0x5B224000,0,1=0x5B224080,0,1,0x5B224000,0,1 ;LHD

0x5B224080,3,1,0x04006100,1,0=0x5B224080,3,1,0x5B220080,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B224000,3,1,0x04006100,3,0=0x5B224000,3,1,0x5B220000,3,1 ;LHD
0x5B220000,1,0,0x04006100,1,0=0x5B220000,1,0,0x5B220000,1,0 ;RHD

;TLA-5 Version
0x5B224000,0,0,0x00004B00,0,0=0x5B224000,0,0,0x5B224080,0,0 ;RHD
0x5B224080,0,1,0x00004B00,0,0=0x5B224080,0,1,0x5B224000,0,1 ;LHD

;into TLA-5
0x5B224000,3,0,0x00004B00,1,0=0x5B224000,3,0,0x51100000,3,0 ;RHD
0x5B224000,3,0,0x00004B00,3,0=0x5B224000,3,0,0x51100000,3,0 ;RHD
